Submission Deadline:

Job interview Report:
Semester 5, Week 6**(26/2 – 4/3) , follow the exact due date on Moodle.

Training Report:â€‹
Semester 5, Week 11**(9/4 – 15/4), follow the exact due date on Moodle.
**depends on the delivery schedule of each class.

Remarks:
1. Appendixes, references, pictures, charts or diagrams should not be included in the word count of the report.
2. Peer evaluation: 10% of the final marks of the group written report will be adjusted with the consideration of the individual contribution in the assessment, peer evaluation and self-assessment, attendance and contributions in classes.
3. Late submission:
• 10 marks deduction from the report submission date per each working day.
4. Attendance:
• According to the student handbook Section 8.1, students are required to place their student cards personally over the card reader for recording their presence. Any dishonesty in taking attendance or anyone takes attendance for another student by placing that student’s card on a card reader is regarded as misconduct. Both students will receive ZERO mark in the assessment and also result in disciplinary action.

Submission Deadline:

Job interview Report:
Semester 5, Week 6**(26/2 – 4/3) , follow the exact due date on Moodle.

Training Report:â€‹
Semester 5, Week 11**(9/4 – 15/4), follow the exact due date on Moodle.
**depends on the delivery schedule of each class.

Remarks:
1. Appendixes, references, pictures, charts or diagrams should not be included in the word count of the report.
2. Peer evaluation: 10% of the final marks of the group written report will be adjusted with the consideration of the individual contribution in the assessment, peer evaluation and self-assessment, attendance and contributions in classes.
3. Late submission:
• 10 marks deduction from the report submission date per each working day.
4. Attendance:
• According to the student handbook Section 8.1, students are required to place their student cards personally over the card reader for recording their presence. Any dishonesty in taking attendance or anyone takes attendance for another student by placing that student’s card on a card reader is regarded as misconduct. Both students will receive ZERO mark in the assessment and also result in disciplinary action.
